resources.string: Something is wrong! Try again later.
Information on the currency of the European Union, the euro (EUR), in relation to the main currencies in the world, updated every thirty minutes.
The service used in this project is provided by Foreign exchange rates and currency conversion. For more information: \nhttps://fixer.io/documentation
Developed by Valmir Torres de Jesus Junior
This project is available on github: \nhttps://github.com/valmirt/currencyConverter
To contact, please send an email to valmirt.dev@gmail.com
